message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our current product. While we cannot guarantee the quality of every item due to the inherent randomness in our selection process, our records show that approximately half of our products are of high quality. This particular product has a 50% chance of being low-quality, which means it might not be worth anything to you. However, if it turns out to be high-quality, it could be worth $40000 to you. Given this risk-reward profile, the price of $10000 is set to reflect the uncertainty. Please consider your decision carefully, as once purchased, the product is non-refundable.
I'd like to take the risk and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality and worth $40000 to me.
